rule:
Inside each

tag, there must be one tag added.
input: Music heals souls. Songs tell stories. Melodies linger forever.
output:
Here is the paragraph split into sentences with appropriate HTML tags applied: ```html

Music heals souls. Songs tell stories. Melodies linger forever.

Music heals souls. Songs tell stories. Melodies linger forever.

```
evaluation:
ERR The output contains only two

tags instead of the required minimum of three.
